: : Wolfenstein/Razor/Diesel/Heartbreak : : 
Wolfenstein was about to say something to Phoenix when he heard the others. 
Razor: Autoguns were right on target... no effect! 
Diesel: It's passing through the shields... 
Heartbreak: Oh man, this isn't good. What in the hell could do that?!!! 
Wolf gets up and stands with the others. 
Wolfenstein: Calm down, kid! Let's see what happens. 
As the energy ball comes in and stops in the room, the nWo all draw weapons on it. 
Razor: I am Razor, the commander here. Whatever you are, can you understand me? 
The preceding has been paid for by the 
New World Order 
 "cardhead649 <cardhead649@...>" <cardhead649@...> wrote: Phoenix::

"I-I'm not sure ..."  Phoenix is confused.  "I'd always thought I was 
one of a kind."

????????::

The autocannon fire is right on target - and passes right through, 
barely slowing the globe's progress at all.  The next second, 
whatever-it-is bounces off the shield like rubber.  But this fails to 
stop the alien for long; it emits a conical energy discharge that 
forces a hole in the base shields long enough for the creature to 
enter.  In a few more seconds, it has made its way to the control 
room, and floats there, peacefully.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Wolfenstein/Diesel : : 
> Wolfenstein: The same signature, huh? Could it be of some relation 
to you? 
> Diesel sees that the energy ball would hit the base quickly, so he 
hits a few buttons on the computer. The deflector shield comes 
online, surronding the the ship and mountain that makes up the nWo 
base. Also the auto guns starts to fire at the energy ball, hopeing 
to stop it in the few seconds left.
> The preceding has been paid for by the
> New World Order
>  "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...> wrote: 
Phoenix::
> 
> "Well, it seems familiar, but I just can't place it."  Phoenix sits 
> up herself, still a bit woozy from the containment failure 
earlier.  
> She glances around, then her voice drops to a whisper: "My spark is 
> abnormal - extremely so.  And its signature matches the sensation 
I'm 
> getting from ... whatever that is."
> 
> ????????::
> 
> The unknown energy signature drops like a stone ... within seconds 
it 
> will enter the base.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > 
> > : : Wolfenstein/Diesel/Razor : :
> > Wolfenstein notices that Phoenix had awoken and was looking up at 
> the ceiling.
> > A proximity alarm sounds and Diesel checks it out on the computer.
> > Diesel: Razor, I think you should look at this.
> > The nWo Commander walks over to the computer and looks at the 
> screen over Diesel's shoulder.
> > Razor: Unknown energy signature headed this way. I dont know what 
> this is, but let's be ready for something, brothers.
> > As the nWo troops prepare for whatever is coming, Wolfenstein 
sits 
> next to their prisoner.
> > Wolfenstein: You know what that thing is dont you, Phoenix? 
Listen, 
> I know that your a prisoner here and that the guys had some 
unplesent 
> plans for you, but you can trust me. I dont want you hurt.
> > The preceding has been paid for by the
> > New World Order
> >  "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:OOC: 
> Anybody awake?  Some sort of answer from the nWo is in order ...

> > 
> > The energy ball passes through the outer atmosphere, on a direct 
> > course for the nWo base.  Exactly WHY it's headed there is a 
> mystery 
> > at the moment, but those moments are rapidly diminishing ...
> >

wrote:The

containment 
> re-
> > > > established."

> > > happened,"

stopped 
> > for 
> > > > good."  She musters the strength to look over at 
> Heartbreak.  "It 
> > > > wasn't your fault."  Then her head droops as she slides into

> > > > lock.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Hollywood Narrator"

> > > > > Spider: Oh, come on you sissies!

> > > > is thrown backwards and into a wall. He falls to the floor 
and
